text: MOTION -- flat out -- it's us -- we're running -- stumbli -- breathing rushed -- blood in the snow... We are JASON BOURNE and we're running down an alley... Supered below:   MOSCOW BLUE LIGHTS -- from the distance -- strobing through the night -- rushing toward us -- POLICE CARS -- three of the - SIRENS HOWLING as they bear down -- closer -- faster -- until they whip past the alley... Up against the wall -- BOURNE is hidden in the shadows. BOURNE is badly wounded -- shot through the shoulder -- bruises and broken bones from the final car chase in SUPREMACY... With a GROAN, he lifts himself up, staggers across a park toward a PHARMACY...
ROWS of MEDICINE and FIRST AID supplies, and in the background, a DOOR being jimmied...It's BOURNE...The ALAR goes off...

VICODIN, as BOURNE grabs it...Then PENICILLIN... Then SURGICAL SUPPLIES: Scalpel...Forceps...Sutures...Cotton gauze...Betadine... BOURNE finds a large sink...Rests his gun there...Lays ou SURGICAL SUPPLIES...Checks out his back in the mirror...Opens the capsules of penicillin and pours the powder directly into the wound...Begins treating himself.
A POLICE CAR pulls up to the curb, lights flashing. One POLICEMAN goes to the jimmied DOOR. SECOND POLICEMAN sees blood and footprints. He motions to his partner to follow...
BOURNE finishing up -- splashes water on his face -- he seems a man on a mission. He looks up -- A MIRROR. His face...
"415" written on a building.
Welcome to the program...
POV Bourne walks down a corridor (corridor #1).
The cops approaching.
Daniels leading Bourne down the corridor.
You'll be saving American lives.

A black sack is thrown over Bourne's head, then: (STOCK) A torrent of quick shots of Bourne's kills: the Professor, Jarda, the blonde guy in Paris, Mr. And Mrs. Neski... And finally. BANG -- Marie hit in the head.      The car the bridge. She sinks away dead...
The POLICE enter the back room, guns drawn.
Put your hands on your head and turn around slowly!

BOURNE snaps out of it, doesn't move. POLICEMAN #1 (older approaches him. When BOURNE doesn't respond to his questions, the POLICEMAN starts forward. BOURNE turns and in one motion grabs his gun from the sink and disables th POLICEMAN. BOURNE freezes POLICEMAN #2 with his gun and a look.
(in Russian) Give me your gun and radio.
POLICEMAN #2's gun and radio skittle across the floor.
(in Russian)
My argument is not with you. BOURNE smashes the radio and takes the gun. BOURNE exits...
A TITLE fades in -- THE BOURNE ULTIMATUM
SUPER:    Six Weeks Later
Establishing shot -- CIA Headquarters
A workman installs a nameplate that reads:    Ezra Kramer Director, CIA.

Kramer listens to a recording with Landy and Cronin. Ther are unhung pictures and a few other items that indicate h has just moved into this job. Two other senior CIA officials sit in on the meeting. Kramer looks at a file on Bourne and Abbott. BOURNE (V.O.)
So we got in the way?   Is that why Neski died? Is that why you killed Marie? Kramer glances at a photo of Marie in the file. ABBOTT (V.O.)
You killed Marie the minute you climbed into her car.   The minute you entered her life she was dead! Kramer looks at Abbott's official photo. BOURNE (V.O.)
I told you people to leave me alone! I fell off the grid. I was half way around the world. ABBOTT (V.O.)
There's no place it won't catch up to you. It's how every story ends. It's what you are, Jason. A killer! You always will be.
CRONIN
We think that's Bourne hitting him on the head and then-- He makes a gun with his hand, i.e. Bourne putting his gun to Abbott's head. ABBOTT (V.O.)
Go ahead!     Go on! Do it! BOURNE (V.O.)
She wouldn't want me to. That's the only reason your alive. The tape clicks off. KRAMER
Who's "she?" CRONIN puts a picture of MARIE in front of KRAMER. LANDY
His girlfriend, Marie. She was killed in India three weeks ago. Kramer looks down at another image.     Abbott dead after suicide. KRAMER

A dirty section chief in league with a corrupt Russian Billionaire commits suicide when confronted by Jason Bourne. You couldn't make this stuff up. (holds up the photo of Abbot dead) You watched this happen? Landy nods.   Kramer shakes his head in disgust at the wh situation. KRAMER
Bourne's last confirmed location is Moscow, three days ago? LANDY
Right. KRAMER
So what does he do now? LANDY
I think he's looking for something he hasn't found. KRAMER
Like what?     What's he after? LANDY
I'm not sure. Maybe he hasn't gotten his memory back yet.  Not all of it. A look from Kramer... KRAMER
Pam, what I need to know is, what kind of a threat is he to us? LANDY
If he just wanted to hurt us he could have sent this tape to CNN. KRAMER

Maybe he still will. Maybe he gave it to you because he wants to throw you in the opposite direction of his real plan. I don't know. I just know my number one rule is "the only way to stay safe is to assume the worst."   As far as I'm concerned Bourne is a serious threat until proven otherwise.
ROSS interviews DANIELS, a TAPE RECORDER on the table between them. ROSS shows DANIELS some of the evidence he' assembled...WANTED POSTERS of JASON BOURNE.

(with poster) ...This one's three years ago -- had half of Interpol after him -- disappeared...Turned up in Naples -- Berlin -- Moscow -- disappeared again... (Daniels says nothing) The girl he was on he run with -- Marie Kreutz -- she turned up dead halfway around the world, from a sniper's bullet... (beat) What connects the dots? Is it Treadstone?
Turn off that tape recorder.

The charm of old Paris captured in the workings of an elevator operating in a wrought-iron shaft... A WORK TABLE, covered with sheet music, music paper, pencils. And, sitting on the upright piano against the wall, a framed PHOTO of MARIE... A KNOCK on a door beautifully, heavily lacquered with centuries of paint... MARTIN KREUTZ, late 20s, opens the door and finds BOURNE. long look between them -- like two lost brothers who recognize each other -- each has been waiting for this moment for a long time.
Martin looks out the window. MARTIN
Where is my sister? BOURNE
She's dead. She was killed. MARTIN
I knew it was going to end this way. It was always going to end this way... BOURNE
I didn't believe that. MARTIN
Why did she die? BOURNE
She was shot. A man came for me. MARTIN
And then you killed him. Bourne nods. MARTIN
Now what? BOURNE
Someone started all this...and I'm going to find them. Bourne looks at him for a beat and leaves.

Bourne climbs the stairs. Bourne rounds a corner and stops, sees a bodyguard at a door up the street hail a car then go back inside. Bourne walks up to the door, the bodyguard comes out agai Bourne knocks him aside. Grabs the man behind him, ELLATRACHE.
(in French)
Who started Treadstone? The bodyguard comes back, gun out--
(in French, to bodyguard)
It's OK! (in French, to Bourne)
They're still looking for you. You are taking a big risk coming here. Bourne shoves him against the wall, hard.
(in French)
Just tell me what I want to know!
(in French)
I just provided them weapons.    I don't know who started--
(in French)
You know something.   Tell me where to start looking.
(in French)
There's a journalist in London. Simon Ross. He seems to know a lot about you.   He has a source inside the program. Someone there from the beginning. What should I tell them if they contact me?
(in English)
They give me the name I want, or I burn their entire house down to get it.
ROSS hurries to catch a TAXI as he talks on his cell phon
...This is big -- a skein of lies -- you pull at it and it just keeps coming -- I'll fill you in when I get home. And it's not finished, either. (beat) They're calling it `Blackbriar'.
Follow this SEQUENCE as...
A LISTENING STATION in England scoops up MILLIONS of CELL PHONE CALLS...Sifts through BILLIONS of words...One word EMERGES from the CHATTER...
A TECHNICIAN sends the data to NSA back in the States...Where another COMPUTER gathers up the rest of th phone call...As we listen...
"Blackbriar" echelon hit. NSA, please confirm receipt.
And there in the CRI HUB, another TECHNICIAN receives the DATA. Stops SUPERVISOR and reports.
Sir, we intercepted a call from London, keyword "Blackbriar."
Okay, send it to CRI right now.
NOAH VOSEN, deft and confident, arrives at CRI Headquarters.
As VOSEN steps out of the elevator and into his office, h is met by his #2, WILLS.
We tracked the phone. Registered to a London reporter named Simon Ross. He works at the Guardian newspaper.
They enter a hallway through double doors towards the HUB
You tracking him? As they pass through, colleague hands WILLS a file.
Yeah, thanks Mike. We have a survey team covering him at work...and a sneak and peek's on their way to his apartment.
Well, who talked to him? How did he find out about Blackbriar?
We don't know, we pulled his background and ran a cross check on any known anomalies, but we've come up with nothing. But, I think if we follow Ross, we are going to be able...
Right. Ross is easy. I want the source. They enter the HUB.
BOURNE buys a newspaper, enters the station and gets on t EUROSTAR. 26A   INT. DAY. CRI DATA ROOM (was 25E) VOSEN and WILLIS listen to the phone call.
Have you heard of an Operation Blackbriar? I'm going to try and get my head around this, see you first thing. VOSEN turns.
Is that all?
Yeah.
I want rendition protocols and I want the asset put on standby, just in case.
VOSEN steps out from DATA ROOM...addresses the HUB.
People, listen up, this is a full priority situation
Jimmy, give me Ross's profile on one. (points at the big screen on the wall)
ROSS'S information come up on the center screen.

Our target is a British national, Simon Ross, a reporter. I want all his phones, his blackberry, his apartment, his car, bank accounts, credit cards, travel patterns...I want to know what he's going to think before he does. Every dirty little secret he has. And most of all, we want the name and real time location of his source. This is NSA priority level 4, any questions?
No response from the HUB.
All right, let's get to it.
The EUROSTAR winds it's way to London.
BOURNE reads The Guardian. He sees an article written by Simon Ross.   Title: "RENEGADE ASSASSIN LOSE IN EUROPE". It mentions BOURNE. There is a photo of Marie--
Marie smiles at him. Marie shot. Marie fades into the depths, dead. Bourne burns Marie's stuff
BOURNE comes out of the flashback.    He is still carryin the pain of her loss Bourne finds Ross's name on the masthead, then goes to th name just below it in the news department.
Ross crosses a busy London street -- heads to Guardian office building. A CRI TEAM watches from a parked car.
TECH #1 watches the data arrive.
Copy that. Mr. Vosen, subject is entering his office.
VOSEN watches the feed.
Where's my picture please?
Coming online...Online...Now.
A surveillance picture flashes onscreen -- ROSS works in his office. HUB chatter about ROSS phone.
Take an hour to get his phone...
That's too long.
Off VOSEN.
ROSS reports to his EDITOR.
So how do we know he's not spinning for someone?
There's more. He was scared.
Scared of what?
Blackbriar. A REPORTER sticks her head in.
Sorry, a call for you.
Who is it?
Won't give hie name. ROSS leaves to pick up the call.
ROSS crosses the busy newsroom...
He's on my line... ROSS picks up the phone. Ross (CONT'D)
Simon Ross.
VOSEN watches as ROSS takes phone call.
Why aren't we hearing this?
That's a hard line, Jimmy, why don't we have it?
We have his line, sir, but he's not on it. WILLS looks confused.
ROSS listens.
Waterloo Station, south entrance, thirty minutes.
Who is this?
This is Jason Bourne.
Bourne You want to talk to me. Come alone.
BOURNE hangs up.
ROSS looks bewildered -- hangs up the phone -- gathers hi stuff -- puts his notebook in his pocket and leaves.
Are you getting an image?
Where's he going?
Okay, he is on the move.   Target is mobile.
The HUB reacts. .
Okay, people, look sharp, give me eyeballs on the street.
SURVEY ONE has panned down to the entrance of the GUARDIA building. Because ROSS is on the move...
Subject is on the move. Go mobile One and Two.
Where's that audio on the street? I want to know where he's going...
ROSS hails a BLACK TAXI. The SILVER VAN pulls out behind him...
VOSEN watches as the feed from the SILVER VAN comes through.
(over radio) We have the subject confirmed.
Where is he heading?
Waterloo Station.
BOURNE arrives on the EUROSTAR.      Enters the station.
As the taxi moves away, the SILVER VAN pulls out behind i A CYCLE COURIER momentarily blocks its path. Looking in o ROSS sifting through documents in the back seat.
Stand by at Waterloo...
BOURNE moving toward the rendezvous...
ROSS pays the DRIVER, exits. Checks his watch.      Looks around. Isn't sure what his next move is--
TECHNICIANS searching for ROSS on the busy street.
Mobile One -- give us eyes on the subject.
MOBILE ONE-- two people from the van-- take up a position in an open stairwell three floors up. They focus a camera down on Ross.
BOURNE buys a cell phone. Activates the SIM card on the n phone. Dumps the pay-as-you-go package in a bin. Rounds a corner. Out of sight.
Screens come alive with a POV of ROSS. VOSEN studies the monitors. ROSS arrives at Waterloo, pays TAXI.
Sir, subject just arrived at the south entrance to Waterloo Station.

ROSS moves to the entrance. Behind him, inside the tube station portico, BOURNE arrives. Sees ROSS. Sees the two survey teams. MOBILE ONE up the stair well and MOBILE TWO at street level. Commuters coming up the escalators. BOURNE joins them - moving towards Ross. Closer. Right on him.   ROSS oblivious.   Looking out onto the street. BOURNE brushes past him and PUTS THE PHONE IN HIS POCKET. ROSS feels the contact. Checking himself -- he's okay. But now a phone is ringing -- looks around, must be someo else. But the vibration's coming from his jacket pocket. ROSS takes out the phone -- not his -- puzzled. ROSS hits "answer."
Hello?
Don't ask questions. Just listen...
VOSEN watching...
What's he doing? I thought we blocked his cell? Who the hell is he talking to???
Jimmy, I need that phone!
(beat)
Activate the asset.
Sir, we haven't yet become operational --
I said activate the asset.   I want options. Wills keys in a CODE...
PAZ, 20s, cool and predatory, drives and waits for instructions...His PHONE buzzes...He reads the code...Accelerates toward Waterloo Station...

BOURNE reaches the top of the stairwell on the other side of the road. His POV to the left -- a LONDON BUS is approaching. To the right -- a young man in a hooded top -- speaking o his cell -- walking toward a BUS STOP... A plan is forming.
SURVEY TWO -- camera zooming in on ROSS.
What's the ROE on this one?
VOSEN thinking it over as he watches the image of ROSS.
ROSS looking around.    Then --

To your left. Blue hooded top. Walking towards the bus stop ROSS has clocked him. The HOODY walks to the bus stop. One hands-free EARBUD swaying down by his side as he moves to a seat. Sitting down. Checking his watch. ROSS shifting nervously from one foot to another. BOURNE (o.s.) (CONT'D)
Go to the bus stop, sit next to him. Head down... The LONDON BUS approaching. ROSS begins to move.
Things are beginning to happen.
Target is on the move.

Okay, who's the guy in the blue hood? Screen POV. ROSS standing next to the HOODY -- head down. Trying to play it cool -- ROSS in clear view of the cameras. "Speaking" with the HOODY. Camera zooming in.

Okay, there, he's talking to the guy with the hood. Take them down. Just then -- A BUS pulling up to the bus stop, blocking both SURVEYS' views. Rifle mics picking up the bus chatter, instead of ROSS. VOSEN.   Annoyed now.
Watch that bus! The bus! -- don't lose them! Stay triangular and don't get blocked.

The crackle of the survey teams as they try and reframe. POV SCREEN -- SURVEY ONE seeing the bus clear.   The HOOD has gone. POV ANOTHER SCREEN -- SURVEY TWO -- camera finally catchi up, picking out the HOODY on the bus as it begins to pull away.
Grab Team B. Grab the hoody and stay with Ross...
TECH'S giving orders...
SURVEY TWO -- three men racing across the road on foot. Weaving through heavy traffic.
BOURNE watching his plan unfold...Only a few seconds to g ROSS out of there...
Take the footbridge. Go to the West Entrance. I'll meet you at the newsstand.
ROSS rearing this -- Moving away -- The BUS moves up to the traffic light.   The AGENTS movin across the street...
VOSEN looking at the screens.   Pointing...
No, no, look...Ross is not on the bus.   Split up the team -- get the guy on the bus and send someone to stay on Ross.

One AGENT peeling off, to keep ROSS in check. The other two AGENTS racing to the bus as it pulls away from the lights. Kicking the doors open, leaping on. GUNS drawn.     So quick.   Passengers screaming.
(to Hoody) You. On the floor. Down.
Pushing the HOODY to the floor.
Driver, stop the bus!
On the HOODY. The HOOD is pulled back. An innocent YOUNG MAN -- terrified, bewildered.
ROSS on the move across the walkway.

SURVEY ONE moving up the steps, only to meet- BOURNE coming down. Three quick moves and he's down- slumped against a wall- just another drunk to step over i the rush hour. Pulls the feed. Takes the earbud. Then back up and falls into step behind ROSS. Listening in to the chaos he has caused -- an ocean away.
TECHIES scrambling to restore the feed.     VOSEN staring
We've lost signal.
What happened to Survey One?
I don't like this. Patch me through to Met surveillance.
PAZ parked up -- gets the call -- pulls out into the traffic. Slicing through to the target area. Waterloo up ahead.
A SECOND SURVEY TEAM -- out of their vehicles.   Furtivel they lock and load their side arms. Fanning out towards the station.
Bourne stops Ross, surprising him.
Why do you know so much about me?
What?
The article. You talked to someone from Treadstone. Someone there at the beginning.  What's his name?
I can't tell you that.... Who's following me?
Whoever they are it's trouble.
Are they Blackbriar?
Blackbriar, what's Blackbriar?
I don't know. I heard the name this morning for the first time. Whatever it is, my source said it started with you.
What? What are you talking about?
Look, just help me get away from these people...and we can talk more...we can--
(spotting approaching operatives)
We have to move. Bourne moves Ross toward the concourse.
Answer your phone.
SCREENS coming alive again. They are through to MET SURVEILLANCE -- the AREA around WATERLOO.
Last sighted heading to the West entrance.
He's got to be close. Seal the entrances.
The new SURVEY team moves towards different entrances -- Ready to beat out the quarry.
CAMERAS suddenly alive.   Movement across the footbridge. The net's been thrown.

Into the station concourse. ROSS moving fast. Fighting through the crowds of faces. Each one a killer in ROSS' tormented mind. BOURNE on the periphery looking out across the throng, picking out the inconsistencies. One AGENT, then another approaching. He dials.
Three o'clock. Female. Blonde black top.
Has she seen me?
Not yet. Dip left past the photo kiosk.
ROSS spinning round. Dipping left.   BLACK TOP passing in the background missing him. BOURNE crossing close behind - marshalling the pieces at breakneck speed.
Straight ahead. News kiosk.
ROSS turning.   Weaving through the commuters. BOURNE seeing cameras turn.    ROSS heading into their pa
Change of plan. Stop. Tie your shoelace.
BOURNE seeing ROSS dip out of view as a group of TOURISTS block the CCTV's line of sight.
That same scene -- scores of TOURISTS -- from VOSEN's poi of view. The TECHS try to get another angle...
ROSS looking through the sea of legs as he finishes tying his laces. Cameras sweeping past.
Are we clear?
Clear. News kiosk. Straight ahead.
ROSS on the move. Sweating. Paranoid. Seeing a BIN MAN coming toward him -- reaching into his trolley.
Straight toward me.     Bin man?
Negative.
He's got a gun.
Negative.    Keep straight ahead. But ROSS swerves out of his path as the BIN MAN pulls out a bunch of keys. CCTV CAMERAS turn -- ZOOMING IN ON ROSS.
Ross' face on all screens.
We got a hit. Middle of the concourse. VOSEN pacing.
We're losing him! We cannot afford to lose him! Frenzied teching as they capture and transmit an image of Ross to...
PAZ flipping open his phone. A voice crackling in his earpiece.
Waterloo concourse. Subject heading east. Paz jamming the wheel hard right. Doing a high speed U- turn. Heading towards the east side of the station.
BOURNE realizes ROSS has been seen. Sees the AGENTS starting to form the box...
Get into cover. Now! ROSS moving faster.
64H             What's the status of the asset?
In place in one minute.

Alright, I want to take him now. Get him out of there and have the asset cover it. WILLS gives orders... 96    INT. CAR TRAVELLING-- MEPHAM STREET -- DAY. PAZ pulling into a side street. Out towards a series of arches that lead underneath the terminal. In his ear...
Target moving towards the stores.

Asset in play. ETA thirty seconds. All exits covered. PAZ through the archway. Grabbing a station plan. Studyin it. 98    Through a subterranean maze of corridors. Up steps. Through doors. On his way to the kill zone.
ROSS moving through crowds around the departures board. BOURNE hearing that last exchange in his earpiece too. Asset in play?
Keep moving... BOURNE's POV: AGENTS closing the box. The departures boar Platform 7. A train waiting.
Faster.... Commuters waiting for the platform
The front... Suddenly -- CLICK -- PLATFORM 7 displays. A wave of commuters flooding away -- sweeping the AGENTS back with them towards platform 7.
BOURNE'S bought them thirty seconds.
PAZ on the move. Earpiece crackling. Through a door. Taki a left down another tunnel. Opens another security door and moves up some steps. Towards a ladder.
The AGENTS regrouping. Speaking into their radios. Voice
He's in the store -- still moving east. ROSS out into the open again. In front of him another STO COMPLEX.
BOURNE searching the concourse. Something bothering him. The threat level clicking another notch.
PAZ heads up some stairs to a service platform. Climbs a ladder.
ROSS into the store complex. To one side is a service doorway. BOURNE sees the AGENTS approaching. Looks the other way - up at the hoardings above. Something's not right. Treadstone instinct.
Service doorway -- Now!
An image of Ross as he enters the store complex appears o the screen.
Store.   Three means of egress.
Close him down...
ROSS through narrow store corridors. Sheer panic now. Two of the AGENTS move in after him. BOURNE behind them. BANG - takes the first out silently.
Keep moving. ROSS moving out to the light as another AGENT follows.
Through the store room. ROSS travelling through.   The second AGENT right behind BOURNE steps out from behind the store room door. The dul snap of bones as second AGENT falls to the floor.
On a screen VOSEN watches, transfixed, as BOURNE takes ou all his agents and then grabs ROBB...
Jesus Christ, that's Jason Bourne.
Maybe he's the source?
It doesn't matter, the asset now has 2 targets. Take them both out. WILLS taps in the order...

PAZ moves cross a narrow walkway. Now he's behind a mechanical 'tri-panel' hoarding. The ki that displays a different advert every 15 seconds. He wai for the change and then--- -- A huge field of vision across the concourse stretching out down below him- a sniper's heaven. PAZ pulling open the motor-casing from the side panel, go to work on it. Slowing the rotation. Rearranging the large triangular prisms to give him just the right time-gap to pull the trigger- and just enough cover to disappear. He takes out rifle parts from his rucksack. Starts to assemble them.
I'm going to get you to safety but you have to stay calm do exactly what I say.
(fear-induced autopilot) Sure, okay.
No, listen to me: Exactly what I say this time. Understand?
Ross snaps to focus.     Looks Bourne in the eye.
Yes.
Stay here while I look for an escape.
Ross nods.
PAZ puts together the rifle.

BOURNE exits from the silver door behind Threshers.    He stays on the phone with Ross. Hidden from the view of the CCTV cameras by the thick crowd, Bourne sees the approaching agents abruptly pullin back.
I can see the entrance from here I can make it out--
No, stay behind that door.
CCTV view of the silver door behind Threshers that ROSS i behind (not Bourne). Wills is on phone.
There. That silver door. Bourne's behind that door?
Confirmed.
Okay, pull the agents back and give Bourne's location to the asset.
On his cell phone Paz receives a text indicating Bourne's location. Paz finds the silver door and aims his rifle at it.
A shape barely visible moving behind the window. Ross but Paz and the Hub think it's Bourne.
Bourne spots the agents pulling back per Wills' orders.
If I run now I can make it--
No.   Something's not right.
Paz awaiting his shot--
The door comes open slightly, but from this angle Paz doesn't have a clean shot at his target (who he thinks is Bourne).
Bourne searches the rafters, looking for any threats from above.
I'm going to go for it, okay?
Don't move until I tell you.
Bourne is distracted by the last of the agents disappearing. Something is definitely wrong--
I'm going to go for it.
No, No not now.
Ross suddenly sprints out from behind the door--
Paz sees the shape emerge--
PAZ fires--
But it's Ross, not Bourne. Ross is hit by Paz's shot. falls, inches from the silver door, dead. Blood has splattered on the door.

Paz snaps his head back to the scope, realizing he's shot the wrong person. Then he catches a glimpse of Bourne-- Bourne ducks behind the gathering crowd, out of Paz's lin of sight, and goes to the body.

Vosen and Wills stare at the screen. At the image of Ross dead on the concourse.   The room -- normally full of chatter has gone dead silent... Vosen puts his head in his hands. This is a monumental screw up and everyone here knows it.  He just had the wrong man killed....
Oh...shit...
Then suddenly Vosen snaps back to focus:
Get the asset out of there ...
What about Bourne?
On the HUB MONITORS we see Police moving in... Vosen doesn't need to see anymore.
Get him out of there - NOW!
Bourne feels Ross' body for something.
Paz is frustrated by the order. He's itching to get anoth shot off at Bourne, but after a beat, packs up quickly, a ordered.
Back in Waterloo, Cops run in from all sides.

On the screens and in real life, the aftermath of the hit PARAMEDICS try helplessly to deal with ROSS -- killed instantly by the head shot meant for BOURNE...POLICE arri and seal off the crime scene...

BOURNE on the move. Fast -- Past platforms. On his way up to the Tri Panel. Up stairs. On to a walkway.   To his right he sees a figu disappearing... PAZ. BOURNE hammers down the walk - way in pursuit.
BOURNE tailing PAZ down on to a parallel platform. PAZ dipping down into the underground entrance.

PAZ moving deliberately through the evening rush hour-- blending in... BOURNE in pursuit. Chasing on instinct. There...A glimpse of PAZ at the bottom of an escalator. BOURNE fights past people. PAZ disappears into the crowd. BOURNE rushes to catch him. Rounding a corner... A long walkway -- at the end, two staircases lead to different tube lines. BOURNE hesitates-- measures the choice. The sound of a train fills the station-- BOURNE -- Fast downstairs. Watches-- just as PAZ gets onto the car at another door. BOURNE lunges to get on the train...But the doors close..
Watching PAZ from the platform as he SAGS down onto a sea nauseated, his skin clammy, his head pounding...He takes out the PILLS and dry-swallows them...Looks up...
Watching PAZ...As if he's looking in the MIRROR at his ol self...The self before THE BOURNE IDENTITY...
He looks straight ahead, just another commuter...
Watching PAZ, as the train pulls away...Then BOURNE is immediately in motion...
Hello.
It's Vosen. We have a situation.
Establishing Sewell and Marbury.

DANIELS watches news of ROSS murder on TV. DANIELS panics opens his safe, packs up papers, takes Blackbriar FILE. Sets alarm. Leaves. 120C   EXT. NIGHT. INTERNET CAFE -- LONDON. BOURNE sits at a computer, the ROSS notebook open in fron of him. He pages through it, finding names, places, "HOW DID THIS ALL START?" -- and Blackbriar.   He Googles "Sewell and Marbury"-- finds Paris, Berlin, Madrid. BOURN continues to search and finds receipt from Madrid. BOURNE leaves.
LANDY steps out of a TAXI...
Vosen's sitting.
(to waiter) Sparkling. And a "Heart-Healthy" omelet with goat cheese and peppers.
Landy arrives. VOSEN
You're late. Traffic? WAITER
(handing her the menu) Ma'am? LANDY
Nothing for me. Vosen looks at her, surprised. VOSEN
I'm buying. She shakes her head, no. She sits, without taking her coa off. She's not staying long. VOSEN
When the Director called, it was suggested we bring you on-- LANDY
Suggested? (beat) Are you sure it was just a suggestion? VOSEN
Funny how different things look depending on where you sit. I look at this as doing a favor for you. Giving you an opportunity to complete some unfinished business. LANDY
Meaning? VOSEN
Jason Bourne. LANDY
Bourne's finished. VOSEN
Really? LANDY
It was finished the moment I realized I was chasing him for something he didn't do.   The case is closed. VOSEN

So what do you make of this? (handing her surveillance photos of Bourne in Paris) French intel picked up Bourne meeting Pierre Elattrache on Tuesday. He threatened to burn our house down if you didn't tell him who started Treadstone. That's a big problem, wouldn't you agree? LANDY
This doesn't feel like Bourne to me. VOSEN
Why's it so hard for you to believe? LANDY
Probably because it's coming from you, Noah. VOSEN
Lets try and be adults okay? We all thought he was done, off the grid. But Bourne's back. Maybe he's a threat. We both want the same thing here. LANDY
So what happened at Waterloo? VOSEN
We have a leak. Bourne showed up in our surveillance. We had very little time to react. LANDY
And the reporter ended up dead? VOSEN
Bourne saw us coming. Landy looks at him, suspicious. LANDY
So what was he doing? VOSEN?
We don't know. But just the fact that he was there means he's up to something, don't you think? Maybe he's the source?
The real question is how you managed to get in a fire fight in the middle of a public train station.
Don't second guess an operation from an armchair, Pam. It's not fair.
I'm going to the office now. I'll make my own introductions.
Off VOSEN...
AN AVE train pulling into the vast station. BOURNE steppi out, walking up the platform. Moving out through the station...
TWO NEW TECHS plus the three we met before.       All wat VOSEN lead LANDY and CRONIN into the room.
This is Pamela Landy. She's gonna be quarterbacking our search effort. I think what we oughta do, just to get started, let's go around the room, say who you are and what your spec is.
LANDY stepping in before this gets going --
Let's do names later. (she's got the floor) What's Bourne's last fixed position? (impatient) Anybody.
London.   Twelve hundred Zulu.
Status?   Wounded?   Armed?
Alive.    Mobile. Unknown.
Where are your grids coming from?
NSA Tactical.
You have an Echelon package?
Yes.
Why isn't it on?
We were waiting.
For what? (no takers) You're nine hours behind the toughest target you've ever tracked. I want everyone to sit down, strap in, and turn on all you've got. (beat) That would mean now.
That lights it.    They're moving.
Thank you.
VOSEN watches...
I want everything you've got on Ross on screen one.
LANDY watches as the screen lights up with ROSS information...

Bourne arrives, begins to recon the area. He goes to the front door finds "Sewell and Marbury" and rings the bell. No answer. Two cops come around a corner. Bourne sees them, notes the side of the building and leaves.
Sir, we just hacked Ross's email account at the Guardian and found a round trip ticket to Turin, yesterday. 0800 arrival, 12:05 departure.
I think we can be pretty certain that Bourne's not your source then?
How?
Ross's call to his editor, where he said he just met the source on Blackbriar, took place just after his flight landed. His met his source in Turin.
So?
So, what, Bourne met Ross for breakfast and then, at noon the same day Bourne calls Ross to demand a meet at Waterloo?
(Needling Wills) Maybe they were even on the same flight?
Cross check the secure cell phone usage of everyone with Blackbriar SCI clearance against all calls in and out of Turin during the morning Ross was there
TECHNICIANS start pounding keyboards.

The guy you're after is a CIA operative with clearance above Top Secret.   He was committing treason by talking to Ross.   Do you really think, while doing that, he used a cell phone he knows we can track?
Zero results on the cross check.
VOSEN stares daggers at her. WILLS
Do you have a better idea? LANDY
Yeah, I'd look at all the people whose cell phones were switched off the entire period Ross was in Turin. WILLS
Do it Jimmy. TECHNICIANS start tapping. LANDY
(looks at Cronin) I mean if your people use their cell phones as much as mine do, the list should be pretty small TECHNICIAN 3 JIMMY

Three names: Tom Brewster, Jack Boulin, Neal Daniels. The names display on the screen:   Tom Brewster, Jack Bou Neal Daniels. The HUB employees can't help but be impressed by LANDY. WILLS and VOSEN notice their response. LANDY
Now check everything in Ross's apartment against those names. Look for common patterns, look for - CRONIN

Initials .....Bring that up on main. LANDY turns.   CRONIN is leaning down in front of a computer screen.   Point to something for the tech --- wh puts it on the big screen, blown up. In a set of handwritten notes by ROSS it says "per N.D."next to several scrawls. LANDY
Neal Daniels.   He's Station Chief in Madrid now, isn't he? WILLS
Jesus Christ.

Call the RSO at the Embassy and have them take Daniels into custody if he's there.   If he's not, get a grab team to the Calle Norte safe house. Send them in heavy and tell them we'll assist with entry.
"Heavy?" Daniels isn't--
I'm worried about Bourne. If he's not Ross's source, then he must be after Ross's source -- just like us.
Off LANDY...

BOURNE in a TAXI turning a corner into a narrow street. The rain has slowed, but the streets are still quiet. BOURNE gets out and walks past the SEWELL and MARBURY fro door, picks the lock and gains entry.

BOURNE up the stairs.   Finds the office.    Jimmies the Disables the alarm. All the signs of a hurried exit. A half filled cup of coffee -- cigarette burned down in an ashtray but not snubbed out -- a light left on -- files and documents, so shredded, some not.
Vosen paces back and forth. The hub is MUCH quieter than it was in the Waterloo scenes.
Parque Vasquez is clean. No sign of subject.
Team two, ETA Callee Norte?
Three minutes.
A BLACK CAR moving briskly through traffic and --
HAMMOND at the wheel.   KILEY with the map. Shutting off phone.
BOURNE checks the office.   Soon he finds a photo of Daniels with Albert Hirsch.
Bourne arrives at a nondescript steel door with two CCTV cameras covering it. He sees 415 written above the door.
The flashback overwhelms Bourne.
POV shots of Bourne walking down the long corridor with Daniels. Other shots revealing that Bourne is in Army dre greens (without hat). Daniels knocks and leads Bourne int
Bourne is driven to his knees.
Bourne is dragged into a room with a large water tank. Hi hands have been bound behind his back, the sack's drawstring pulled tight, and he has been weighted down. Bourne is shoved into the water.
Bourne falls into the water. SPLASH. He starts to sink. The wet sack allows us to see the outlines of his face. Also POVs as Bourne sinks.

head_text.subj: FB3E SERIES OF SHOTS FROM ABOVE AND BELOW WATER --FLASH

text: Bourne struggles wildly at first. Tries to get out of his restraints. But to no avail. SRD men watch him from the edge of the tank. Perhaps also on monitors. Expressionless.
Bourne fights every human instinct to draw a breath.    A shot from Bourne's POV:

You're going to drown. There is nothing you can do to prevent this. Stop struggling and accept it. Finally Bourne can't hold his breath for an instant longe His mouth opens. Water rushes in. He convulses, begins to drown...
Bourne's body goes limp.   SRD men watch.   No reaction.
Bourne goes limp.   POV of him blacking out.
BOURNE comes out of the FLASHBACK. As he staggers across the room, he notices a car arriving on the monitor...
A car approaches.
Bourne snaps out of it and sees the car on a security monitor. 127C   EXT. STREET. Agents get out of car and approach building.
Sir, they're at the front door.
VOSEN watches...
HAMMOND AND KILEY enter the building.
BOURNE runs water into the TEA KETTLE -- sets the trap...
HAMMOND and KILEY enter.
We're in.
BOURNE listens from his hiding spot.
LANDY paces.
Okay, put it live.
HAMMOND moves quickly into the room -- gun raised. HAMMOND at the alarm box.
Alarm's down.
That has to be Bourne.
VOSEN already moving to the monitor.
HAMMOND and KILEY -- move cautiously from room to room -- they've done it before...
(into mike) Safe's cleaned out.
VOSEN pacing impatiently around the speakerphone --
Shit...    Track the passports.

KILEY gestures to a light moving under a door. Kiley crouching...leaning in...hand on the knob, and -- Pulls the closet DOOR OPEN -- Nothing. Sink, dishes. a small kitchen.         And... on stove...a tea kettle and a spoon... Which is the last thing they'll remember, because... BOURNE -- coming around the corner fast -- full stop and BOURNE lays out HAMMOND... KILEY turns to find BOURNE -- who takes him out too. Then it stops. BOURNE yanks the headsets.       Closes the PHONE.
The SCREENS go black.       Silence...
Goddamn it! Get a back-up team in there!
TEA KETTLE payoff...
How long till back-up arrives?
The hub scrambles to answer that...       Landy paces in background. Suspicious of Vosen...
How long? (beat, loud, to the entire hub) Stop! Hang on. I have an idea...

ON A SECURITY MONITOR -- BOURNE sees another figure movin up the stairs...Checking his watch, reloading his gun. Twisting into the path to shoot as the door opens, hesitating because- It's NICKY. A beat -- long unbroken.
What are you doing here?
I was posted here after Berlin.
Where's Daniels?
The office PHONE goes. Bourne waving her to it.   She pic it up. He hits the speaker phone.
Hello.
Who is this?
This is Nicky Parsons. Who's this?

Landy reacts to her voice... Both Vosen and Landy strongly suspect Bourne is there and listening... Vosen reads her "Duress Challenge" identity check off the screen. It reads: Challenge:    "Sparrow" Response if Under Duress:       "Ruby" Response if Normal:    "Everest" VOSEN
Nicky, I need to do an ID challenge first. Code in: "Sparrow." Vosen looks at the screen to check her response... NICKY
Response: "Everest". VOSEN
Nicky, this is Noah Vosen. How long have you been on site? NICKY (V.O.)
I just walked in. VOSEN
We have two officers on site. Are you in contact with them? NICKY (V.O.)
They're down. Unconscious, but alive. VOSEN
Is there any sign of Daniels? NICKY (V.O.)
No. LANDY
Nicky, this is Pam Landy. We have reason to believe there is a connection between Neal Daniels and Jason Bourne. NICKY (V.O.)
Bourne, are you still looking for Bourne? I thought the case was closed. LANDY
No, some people are convinced he's still a threat. I disagree but to find out I need to talk to him. VOSEN seething because LANDY has interrupted him... VOSEN
Hold on Nicky. Vosen hits the mute button. VOSEN
What are you doing? You know Bourne's probably listening. Landy doesn't answer.    Vosen to Wills:
How long till back up arrives.
Wills holds up three fingers.      Vosen unmutes.
(into microphone again) Listen, Nicky. I want you to stay put and secure the premises. It could be an hour until another team arrives.
LANDY piercing VOSEN with a look...
BOURNE continues to hold the gun in her face -- NICKY is very calm considering the predicament she is in.
Okay.
DIAL TONE as the line gets closed at the other end.
They know you're here.
How long do I have?
Three minutes...
FLASH: TWO SEDANS squeal around a corner.      CRI reinforcements.
2 minutes to safehouse.
My car's outside.    I know where Daniels is.
BOURNE lowers his gun, grabs the phone and dials "1-1-2"
Emergency operator. Where is your emergency?
BOURNE answers her in perfect Spanish with a perfect Madr accent, but worked up, like a civilian would be...
334 Calle Norte. I hear gunfire. And men shouting. I think they're Americans --
BOURNE pushes the phone off the desk -- fires four shots into the ceiling -- calmly moves Nicky towards the back door...
You "disagree" he's a threat? He just took out two more of my men. Not to mention his ultimatum to Ellatrache?
The only way this has a happy ending, Noah, is if we find a way to bring Bourne in voluntarily.
He wants revenge, Pam. The only realistic way to deal with this is to eliminate the threat.
BOURNE and NICKY rapidly descend.
Okay, where is Daniels headed?
8 o'clock this morning, he wired $100,000. to a numbered bank account in Tangier.
Okay, Tangier is about 300 miles away, we can make the morning ferry.
And then what?
Bourne and Nicky exit on to the street.     Suddenly they tires squealing nearby.
They're coming.
They continue to walk down the street towards Nicky's car
Vosen and Landy are watching this live. As they cross the street two MADRID POLICE CARS come arou the corner the wrong way and screech to a stop. Vosen reacts...
Four cops jump out and take aim at the AGENTS.
Manos Arriba! Manos Arriba!
More sirens closing in.      A third police car appears. Then a fourth...
Vosen can't believe it--
The agents drop their guns and surrender. BOURNE and NICKY continue around a corner -- they get in her VW GOLF and drive away...
Vosen stares at Landy.    A beat, then she walks out.
Issue a standing kill order on Jason Bourne, effective immediately.
VOSEN on the phone.
We lost Bourne.
You still think he's after Daniels?
Yeah. Nicky's just the means. But if we find Daniels, we'll find Bourne.
Daniels knows way too much. Daniels knows everything. We can't let them meet.
I'll take care of it.
Good. (beat)
And fill Hirsch in.     Just in case.
BOURNE and NICKY sit over coffee.    A long silence...the
What are you after, Jason?   Why are you looking for Daniels?
Do you know who this is? Bourne puts the photo of Daniels and Hirsch on the table between them.    She looks at the photo, points.
That's Daniels. (points at Hirsch)
I don't know who that is.
I have to get back to the beginning...or I'll never be free of this.
Who is he?
I think he started Treadstone.    I remember meeting him.   I remember the first day... (beat) Daniels brought me to him.
Nicky looks back at him....not sure what to say.
What happened?
An initiation...I guess...
QUICK FLASH: Bourne, head in sack, is held underwater, struggling desperately for breath--
Bourne comes out of the flashback.      Nicky is looking him....
Jason...that wasn't some one-off initiation. Daniels said they did that to you over and over again.   That's how they...
She doesn't finish.    And Bourne doesn't ask her to. a long pause.
Why are you helping me?
It was difficult for me...with you.
BOURNE looks up.    Another long pause...
You really don't remember anything?
No.
NICKY'S face. Two SPANISH COPS enter the cafe.
We should move.
They get up and leave...
Vosen goes to his safe.
(to voiceprint mic) Noah Vosen.
Then he puts his thumb into a print reader. The safe door pops open. He pulls out a file marked "Top Secret."
CRONIN makes his way down the hallway. LANDY works at her desk.       CRONIN enters...
They tracked Daniels' passport to a hotel in Tangier. They're holding up a bank transfer he made to keep him in place while they move an asset in from Casablanca.
Off LANDY.    This just keeps getting worse...
Landy enters without knocking.
Since when do you have authorization for lethal action against Daniels?
Since he cleaned out a Blackbriar safe and fled to Morocco!
So grab him--
I don't have the people on the ground to do that and I'm not going to risk that file falling into the wrong hands.
What's going on?    What's Daniels got?
What's he got? He ran all of Blackbriar's operations in Southern Europe and North Africa.
I think the world's well aware we have a rendition and lethal action capability at this point, Noah.
For Christ's sake, Pam, he's got our entire playbook. Names, dates, ghost sites, how we train our assets.....
You still don't have the authority to kill him.
Oh, yes I do, Pam. Vosen holds up the file we saw him pull out of his safe. It is labeled "Blackbriar: Lethal Action Protocol."

That's what makes us special. No red tape. No more getting badguys in our sights and then watching them escape while we wait for some bureaucrat to issue the order. Landy opens up the file. Sees the words "instantaneous lethal action is authorized when..."
You just decide? No oversight. No checks and balances.
Come on, Pam, you've seen the raw intel. You know how real the threat is.    We can't afford to have our hands tied like that anymore.
BOURNE and NICKY ride the ferry from Gibraltar to Morocco...
They arrive and pass through CUSTOMS...
DANIELS drives...
DESH arrives, grabs a TAXI...

BOURNE and NICKY enter a shabby room. Turn on the fluorescent lights... BOURNE tosses his BACKPACK on the bed... NICKY plugs her LAPTOP into the USB port... ON THE SCREEN, as NICKY hacks into the system... BLACKBRIAR...
Landy on the phone.
It's Pamela Landy for him. Would you tell him it's urgent?
The phone buzzes.   Kramer picks it up.
It's Pam Landy. She says it's urgent.
On Kramer...the wheels turning....
Tell her I'm unreachable.
Kramer hangs up.
Landy receives the news.... The wheels turning in her head.... She hangs up.    A pensive moment, then she gets up and heads for--
LANDY AND CRONIN enter the hub-- VOSEN is in the middle of giving the kill order.
Give me the subject's location.
Subject is currently on foot and now entering Hotel Velazquez. 45 Route Commerce, Tangier.
Get an elevation and a floor plan, tic-tac-toe. Locate the room. Give the asset Daniels's location and the route between Daniel's hotel and the bank.
DESH looks down at his beeping cellphone.      It has a M the screen.
Nicky at her computer. SHE LOGS IN WITH HER USER I.D. Bourne looks on.
Vosen and Wills.    Landy still pacing
Do we have that room yet?
Yes sir Room 117.
Get the hotel's trunk line. Run all calls through here with an iso on 117
Sir, the asset is acquiring the materials.
DESH opens a lock-up and goes in. He comes out with a scooter and drives off.
Nicky types on computer.    Enters search parameter: NEAL DANIELS. ACCESS DENIED.
His location's being blocked.
Now they found Daniels, do you know where he is?
They'll get one of the operatives to terminate him.
Find out who.
Desh works on a bomb.
Desh.
DESH BOUKSANI's profile.
Tell him you're going to meet him and that you have a new phone for him.
If you stop Desh they'll just get someone else.
We're not going to stop him. We're going to follow him. He'll take us right to Daniels.
"Meet me Tangier Cafe Paris" The bomb is finished on the Work table.
Desh takes the scooter out.
Bourne and Nicky walk. Desh rides his scooter. TIGHT ON COMPUTER SCREEN: DESH'S ICON TURNS OFF COURSE.
Sir, the asset is deviating.
Find out why.

head_text.subj: EXT. ACROSS FROM CAFE DE PARIS. DAY

text: BOURNE, recalculating. Looking around him. A scooter is pulling up and the driver walks toward BOURN
Asset unscheduled stop.

NICKY SITS, Desh walks up and snatches the phone off of t table. A scooter is pulling up and the driver walks toward BOURN He brushes past him, taking the key. Keeping DESH in sight as he returns to his Vespa and pull out in to traffic.
Sir, the asset is on the move, in route to subject.
Sir, the asset is back on course.
VOSEN looks up.

Sir, we have an unauthorized breach. Someone with active system knowledge has penetrated out protocols. Information was passed to the asset at 14.11. (beat) The trace is confirmed and valid. It comes from a computer belonging to Nicky Parsons.
VOSEN looks over at Landy....his wheels turning.   A seri of cuts between them.
Where did the course deviation occur?
South to Rue Belgique. Stationery at Place de France.
That's where Parson's is.
He pauses, deciding what course to take.    Landy watches VOSEN
When we're finished with Daniels send the asset after her. We find Parsons, we find Bourne. LANDY (OVERLAPPING)
(going to Vosen, firm) Noah, what are you doing? VOSEN
Not now. LANDY
Now.   I want to know what's going on. VOSEN
Not now. LANDY
I'm asking on what basis you're continuing this operation. VOSEN
On the basis that Nicky Parsons has compromised a covert operation. She is up to her neck in it. LANDY
This is about Daniels, not Nicky! VOSEN
She has betrayed us! LANDY
You don't know the circumstances! VOSEN
She's in league with Jason Bourne for Chrissake! LANDY
You don't have the authority to kill her or Bourne! VOSEN
Yes, I do Pam, it's right here and it's legal. VOSEN slams a document on the desk.   INSERT SHOT: "Blackbriar: Lethal Action Protocol." LANDY
She's one of our own.   You start down this path...where does it end?!
It ends when we've won.
LANDY turns and storms out...
Notify the asset of the additional target.
Yes, sir.
BRYAN codes in a kill order on NICKY...
As he rides his VESPA, DESH receives additional target information..Pictures of BOURNE and NICKY. DESH glances in his rearview mirror -- spots BOURNE.
Have the bank release the funds.
A TECH calls DANIELS.
DANIELS answers phone.
Mr. Daniels, Bank of Tangier. Your funds are now available.
Daniels leaves.

DESH parks the motorbike and walks around the corner, BOURNE follows. DANIELS' car coming down the street.     BOURNE stops and the car -- realizes the danger. BOURNE turns back to see DESH with the detonator in his hand. BOURNE locks eyes with DESH.      Before BOURNE can react DESH detonates. BOOM! DANIELS is DEAD. BOURNE is thrown across the street by the blast.     He l MOTIONLESS. DESH POV. He looks back to see BOURNE not moving, lying i the street. DESH gets on his motorbike and heads off to kill NICKY.
NICKY still at that cafe waiting. Taking out her phone- puzzled. She answers. Looking around. NICKY                                     *
Code in?                                            * (no reply)                                      * Code in?                                            * Nothing. Just the noise of traffic.
DESH on the move towards Petit Socco. On the cell - makin that 'silent call'.
BOURNE'S too late- hearing the 'line busy' tone. Knows th tactic. And those POLICEMEN are getting closer.
Frenzied teching. A screen comes alive. TECHY                                     *
We have a trace.                                    * TECHY 2                                   *

Target heading north. Rue des                       * Chretiens. Intercept ETA six                        * minutes.                                            * VOSEN                                     *
Okay, that's it.    Bar her cell.                   * Tie it off.                                         *

DESH is disappearing from view. And the POLICEMEN are surrounding BOURNE. Demanding to se his papers. BOURNE speaking in Spanish - fishing for his papers. Looking back up the street. Forming a plan. Checking his watch. More POLICE arriving now. And DESH has disappeared out of sight. No time for this. BOURNE breaks away. Through the crowds into the traffic. Police whistles- shouting. Confusion. The chase is on. Three policemen turning into his path. No choice. BOURNE taking them down. Sprinting out across the road. A KID and his moped. Caught up in the police dragnet. BOURNE leaping on the bike - kick-starting it. Away into traffic as two squad cars turn and make chase. BOURNE weaving through traffic. One hand on the bike the other on the cell, desperately trying to call NICKY. But now, at least he's got a dial tone.
NICKY grabbing the cell. Answering. NICKY                                 *
Bourne?                                           * BOURNE                                *
Nicky?    Listen to me.   You need                * to -                                              * The line goes dead. Looking at the screen - 'SERVICE
Really spooked now- looking around. Time to move. Dismantling the phone instinctively - scattering it's components. She starts to make her way out of the square.
DESH through the streets-getting closer - heading towards the PETIT SOCCO.

BOURNE picking up the pace. Three more police cars out of side road just missing him. BOURNE choosing his exit. Up ahead- a narrow alleyway - taking it. The squad cars crunching to a halt, behind him.
DESH crossing the SQUARE weaving through a sea of push bikes. Parking his Vespa at the corner of RUE DES CHRETIENS. Travelling on foot.
NICKY - trying to keep calm. Checking each alley. Moving on.

BOURNE arriving - seeing NICKY has left. Seeing DESH'S Vespa parked up. More police - on foot now. BOURNE parking up. Seeing the crowded streets. Looking up to the rooftops. He needs to get higher. Starts running up steps.

BOURNE into a riad. Through a courtyard - up more stairs up a ladder. Out onto the rooftops. Scanning the skyline. A beat. Has he misjudged? No, there in the distance at the top of a narrow street- NICKY walking slowly and behind DESH. Moving quickly. BOURNE tailing him - trying to close the gap. Dipping dow through another riad - through an alley. Up more stairs. Back up onto another roof. He's gained a few metres on DESH. Desh goes up to the rooftops now. Bourne has him in sight DESH is prepping his gun with a silencer. DESH speeding up. BOURNE sees NICKY down below amongst th crowds. In Desh's sights. BOURNE knows he has to gain more ground. CABLE CAM shot - Two trained assassins leaping across the narrow streets - silently effortlessly -- the cops down below searching the alleyways, oblivious to the chase unfolding above them. BOURNE nearly on terms with him - then -- DESH dipping down again into the street below.       Avoi the police -- he melts into the crowds. STEADYCAM SHOT - following BOURNE as he heads downstairs. More stairs. Through a corridor then a courtyard - bursting out of a door into the street - A police checkpoint. Right in his path.     Bourne forced dog leg and take another route. BOURNE'S lost him- for the moment.

NICKY - walking fast up the Rue des Chretiens.       Wond why there are so many police around. Suddenly stopping - seeing DESH - knows instantly that he is coming for her. Now we see NICKY'S skills.    Has to think on her fee t-
Checking the alleyways.     Slipping out of sight. NICKY looking to the rooftops -- taking the advantage. some steps -- into a riad. Desh tracking her.
BOURNE seeing Desh again - further up the street.      He in that direction.
NICKY through one hallway - then another.    Moving up al the time.
DESH arriving at the steps. Looks up to where Nicky is going. Takes the entrance to the next building. Anticipates her next move. Aiming to cut her off.

NICKY up steps.    Out onto the rooftops.   Looking for a across them. Scrabbling across the roof of this crumbling riad.    Kno she can't go back down. She makes it across to the next building. Where Desh is...
BOURNE up high.    Seeing NICKY on that other roof. He can't get across to her.    Moving fast now. Down steps.   Into the riad courtyard.

BOURNE entering the hallway. Moving up the stairs.   Towards Nicky. And towards Desh. Meanwhile NICKY moving down. Looking out into the courtyard below. The sound of POLICE getting nearer. BOURNE hearing the POLICE too as he moves up onto a landing.

BOURNE into a main room - something stirring on a couch - girl and her little sister having a siesta. In another room two small boys fast asleep.    TV playing One wakes. A noise on the stairs above. Quickly arranging a mirror - getting line of sight - Bourne dipping into a corner. It's NICKY. She gives him a look -- DESH is in here somewhere. The door goes below them.   The noise of Police entering Riad. NICKY signalling to BOURNE - this way. They climb narrow stairs to the next floor. Down below Police begin searching rooms. Waking the sleeping family. Shouting, crying. Commotion.

BOURNE and NICKY creeping up the steps. Then - suddenly NICKY spinning round as two silenced bullets speed past her - And DESH bursting out of a landi toilet. On to Bourne. Full on Treadstone fighting in the narrow stairwell. Crashing into a tiny disused lift cage- silent constraine vicious. Downstairs a young POLICEMAN hears the noise- heading for the lift. NICKY seeing the handle turn. Thinking quickly.   She sen the lift up to the next floor. The POLICEMAN stepping back from the door -- directing th other cops out to the courtyard.
